attributes.action: Leave office now, and anmnouce an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call upon the Prime Minister, RH Tony Blair, to leave office immediately, and on leaving office, to hold a general election forthwith.
The country needs to voice its opinion by means of a general election on who runs this country, and who is best placed to decide our future.
Running the country is a democratic procedure and should be decided by our peers in parliament and not by the whim and fancy of 1 man alone. 
This Prime Minister is an undemocratic leader, guilty at best of economy of truth with statements to all political parties deciding whether this country should wage war against another sovereign country. In consequence of this, he is implicit in the unnecessary deaths of many of our armed forces personnel.
Our country needs a leader of good character, a leader willing to put the country first and political ideals second.  Tony Blair has a proven track record of not representing the rights of the British people, and as such is not fit to hold office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
